ecosystem.name: Circle Account
ecosystem.description: The new global financial account built on USDC. Convert funds from 80+ countries into USDC. Securely store, make and receive on-chain USDC payments.

ecosystem.name: Circle APIs
ecosystem.description: Circle APIs bring the benefits of scalable USDC wallet infrastructure and global on- and off-ramps into an emerging global public payment and e-commerce ecosystem built on blockchains.
